content: welcome to krissy s over the mountain crochet and crafts this crochet pattern is quick to crochet and fun to embellish 1 easy to find yarn 2 easy to read pattern 3 great photos and charts 4 video support to crochet the basket 5 video support to make the fabric covered doll bed 6 short tutorial 1 on how to embellish this gingerbread moses basket is the perfect festive gift for your little ones this holiday season this pattern is quick and such an enjoyable project no worries about finding the right yarn you will hold 2 strands of stiff worsted weight yarn throughout most of the construction the pattern includes an easy-to-read pattern complemented by photos and charts so that you can crochet this moses basket with confidence there is also video support not only for crocheting the basket but also for creating a fabric-covered doll bed bonus if love to add a personal touch i will soon be providing additional resources and inspiration to embellish your gingerbread moses basket you will be able to turn this intoit a truly unique and cherished holiday keepsake craft happiness this season with krissy s over the mountain crochet & crafts where joy is woven into every stitch copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright©krissysoverthemountaincrochet 2023 do not distribute alter or share this pattern in any shape or form you have my permission to sell the product you make using my pattern no mass production is allowed 1 https //youtube com/shorts/oy8gpryxtwm feature=share
